text: Franz Perner is an Austrian Paralympic athlete. He competed in alpine skiing at the 1976 Winter Paralympics and in cross-country skiing at the 1980 Winter Paralympics, at the 1984 Winter Paralympics and at the 1988 Winter Paralympics. He also competed at one event in biathlon at the 1988 Winter Paralympics. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font- size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location !!Position !!Event !!Time |- | rowspan=3 | 1976 | rowspan=3 | 1976 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=3 | Örnsköldsvik, Sweden | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Men's Alpine Combination III | 1:26.17 |- | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Men's Giant Slalom III | 2:44.45 |- | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Men's Slalom III | 1:23.47 |- | 1980 | 1980 Winter Paralympics | Geilo, Norway | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Men's 4x5 km Relay 3A-3B | 1:28:50.0 |} == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Austria Category:Paralympic cross-country skiers of Austria Category:Alpine skiers at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Biathletes at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing Category:Paralympic medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Medalists at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Winter Paralympics
title: Franz Perner
